structure.unit: COUNTY ROAD ENGINEER AND MAINTENANCE OF PUBLIC ROADS

law.text:
As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires:
"County roads" are as defined in KRS 178.010.
"County engineer" means county road engineer.
"Obstructions" includes any object which prevents the easy, safe and convenient use of a county road for public travel.
law.history: Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 68, sec. 3. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 162, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4308-2, 4338.
